overview: Another Repeats “Only The Lord Knows!” Until He Knows Not What The Lord Knows, The Lord Doesn't Even Know, The Lord’s Been Replaced By Sanity And Saintly Stature Among Sickness And Health. Another Crutched And Straitjacketed Set Straight And Crushed Beneath Contemptuous Castles Of Conformity. Bullied, Beating And Broken Then Buried.
title: Glimmered Barriers Of Times Dust
